verses.text: Alleluia. \w Give|strong="H3034"\w* glory \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good: \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H7121"\w* ever.

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* shall declare \w the|strong="H3605"\w* powers \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord? \w who|strong="H3605"\w* shall set forth \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w praises|strong="H2167"\w*?
Blessed \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* keep judgment, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* do justice \w at|strong="H3068"\w* all times.

Remember \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* favour \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy people: visit \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thy salvation.

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w see|strong="H6381"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* good \w of|strong="H6310"\w* thy chosen, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* joy \w of|strong="H6310"\w* thy nation: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst be praised \w with|strong="H6310"\w* thy inheritance.
We \w have|strong="H1121"\w* sinned \w with|strong="H2233"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* fathers: we \w have|strong="H1121"\w* acted unjustly, we \w have|strong="H1121"\w* wrought iniquity.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers understood \w not|strong="H0776"\w* thy wonders \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* remembered \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy mercies: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* provoked \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wrath going \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sea, \w even|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Red Sea.

\w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H1285"\w* saved \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w for|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* \w own|strong="H5769"\w* nameâ€™s sake: \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H1285"\w* might \w make|strong="H2142"\w* \w his|strong="H6680"\w* power known.

\w And|strong="H0085"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* rebuked \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Red Sea, \w and|strong="H0085"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* dried up: \w and|strong="H0085"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* led \w them|strong="H0854"\w* through \w the|strong="H0834"\w* depths, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0854"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* wilderness.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* saved \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1285"\w* \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* hated \w them|strong="H5975"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3478"\w* redeemed \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* enemy.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* water covered \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* afflicted \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: there \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w one|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w*.
\w And|strong="H1961"\w* they believed \w his|strong="H1961"\w* words: \w and|strong="H1961"\w* they sang \w his|strong="H1961"\w* praises.

\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H1471"\w* quickly \w done|strong="H1980"\w*, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* forgot \w his|strong="H0413"\w* works: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* waited not \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* counsels.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* coveted \w their|strong="H5921"\w* desire \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* desert: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* tempted \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* place \w without|strong="H3808"\w* water.
\w And|strong="H5030"\w* he gave \w them|strong="H5060"\w* \w their|strong="H5060"\w* request: \w and|strong="H5030"\w* sent fulness into \w their|strong="H5060"\w* souls.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* provoked Moses \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* camp, Aaron \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holy \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.
\w The|strong="H6440"\w* earth opened \w and|strong="H7971"\w* swallowed up Dathan: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* covered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* congregation \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Abiron.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* fire \w was|strong="H5315"\w* kindled \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* congregation: \w the|strong="H0935"\w* flame burned \w the|strong="H0935"\w* wicked.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* made \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* calf \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Horeb: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* adored \w the|strong="H0935"\w* graven \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* changed \w their|strong="H7971"\w* glory into \w the|strong="H7971"\w* likeness \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* calf \w that|strong="H4428"\w* eateth grass.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* forgot God, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* saved \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H4910"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w* great \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt,
Wondrous works \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0631"\w* land \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Cham: terrible things \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0631"\w* Red Sea.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* said \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* destroy \w them|strong="H0935"\w*: \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w* Moses \w his|strong="H0935"\w* chosen \w stood|strong="H0935"\w* before \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* breach: \w To|strong="H0935"\w* turn \w away|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* wrath, lest \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w should|strong="H0776"\w* destroy \w them|strong="H0935"\w*.
\w And|strong="H6509"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* set at nought \w the|strong="H0853"\w* desirable land. \w They|strong="H5971"\w* believed not \w his|strong="H5971"\w* word,

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* murmured \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w their|strong="H2015"\w* tents: \w they|strong="H5971"\w* hearkened not \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* lifted up \w his|strong="H0834"\w* hand \w over|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*: \w to|strong="H7971"\w* overthrow \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* desert;

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* cast \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* seed \w among|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w nations|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* scatter \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* also \w were|strong="H1697"\w* initiated \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Beelphegor: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* ate \w the|strong="H1697"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* dead.

\w And|strong="H1818"\w* they provoked \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w their|strong="H2015"\w* inventions: \w and|strong="H1818"\w* destruction \w was|strong="H4325"\w* multiplied among \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.
\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* Phinees stood \w up|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* pacified \w him|strong="H4428"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* slaughter ceased.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H1366"\w* \w was|strong="H1366"\w* reputed \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* unto justice, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* generation \w and|strong="H0935"\w* generation \w for|strong="H3605"\w* evermore.

\w They|strong="H0776"\w* provoked \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w also|strong="H0784"\w* \w at|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* waters \w of|strong="H0776"\w* contradiction: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w Moses|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* afflicted \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* sakes:
Because \w they|strong="H5221"\w* exasperated \w his|strong="H5221"\w* spirit. \w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H5221"\w* distinguished \w with|strong="H6086"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* lips.

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* did \w not|strong="H0369"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nations \w of|strong="H4557"\w* which \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w them|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H0776"\w* mingled \w among|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heathens, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* learned \w their|strong="H3605"\w* works:

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* served \w their|strong="H3605"\w* idols, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w* became \w a|strong="H5221"\w* stumblingblock \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w they|strong="H0369"\w* sacrificed \w their|strong="H3318"\w* sons, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* daughters \w to|strong="H0369"\w* devils.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* shed innocent blood: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* blood \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* daughters which \w they|strong="H3588"\w* sacrificed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* idols \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Chanaan. \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w was|strong="H4714"\w* polluted \w with|strong="H5921"\w* blood,

\w And|strong="H3915"\w* \w was|strong="H6051"\w* defiled \w with|strong="H3915"\w* \w their|strong="H6566"\w* works: \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w they|strong="H3915"\w* went aside after \w their|strong="H6566"\w* own inventions.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Lord \w was|strong="H8064"\w* exceedingly angry \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* people: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* abhorred \w his|strong="H0935"\w* inheritance.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* delivered them \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* nations: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* they \w that|strong="H4325"\w* hated them \w had|strong="H6697"\w* dominion over them.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* enemies afflicted \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* humbled under \w their|strong="H3588"\w* hands:

Many times did \w he|strong="H0853"\w* deliver \w them|strong="H0853"\w*. \w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* provoked \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* counsel: \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* were \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* low by \w their|strong="H3318"\w* iniquities.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* saw \w when|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* tribulation: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* heard \w their|strong="H5414"\w* prayer.

\w And|strong="H2706"\w* \w he|strong="H8451"\w* was mindful \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* covenant: \w and|strong="H2706"\w* repented according \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H8451"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* mercies.
And he gave them unto mercies, in the sight of all those that had made them captives.
Save us, O Lord, our God: and gather us from among nations: That we may give thanks to thy holy name, and may glory in thy praise.
Blessed be the Lord the God of Israel, from everlasting to everlasting: and let all the people say: So be it, so be it.
